traits.name: Charge
traits.description: If you move at least 30 feet straight toward a target and then hit it with a melee weapon attack on the same turn, you can immediately follow that attack with a bonus action, making one attack against the target with your hooves.

traits.name: Equine Build
traits.description: You count as one size larger when determining your carrying capacity and the weight you can push or drag. Climbing that requires hands and feet costs 4 extra feet of movement.

traits.name: Hooves
traits.description: You have hooves that you can use to make unarmed strikes. When you hit with them, the strike deals 1d6 + your Strength modifier bludgeoning damage.

traits.name: Natural Affinity
traits.description: You have proficiency in one of the following skills of your choice: Animal Handling, Medicine, Nature, or Survival.
